sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.FSMWorkspaceUAUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Track the usage analytics data for FSM workspace</description>
        <name>FSMWorkspaceUAUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var FSMWorkspaceUAUtil = Class.create();
FSMWorkspaceUAUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    // Tracks number of work orders that are created via CSM Agent Workspace
    createWorkOrder: function() {
        this.logWOAnalytics('create.wo', 'create');
    },

    logWOAnalytics: function(eventType, action) {
        var data = {};
        data["event.type"] = eventType;
        data["action"] = action;
        data["user.id"] = gs.getUserID();
        this.logAnalytics(data);
    },

    logAnalytics: function(data) {

        try {
            var streamId = "snc.fsm.workspace";
            var obfuscationList = [];

            if (sn_uapaf.ScopedAnalyticsFramework.isDisabled() || sn_uapaf.ScopedAnalyticsFramework.isBlocked(streamId)) {
                gs.info("FSMWorkspaceUAUtil: Analytics Framework is disabled or Blocked!!");
                return;
            }

            data["app.name"] = "fsm.workspace";
            data["metadata.version"] = "1";

            status = sn_uapaf.ScopedAnalyticsFramework.open(streamId);
            if (status === 0) {
                status = sn_uapaf.ScopedAnalyticsFramework.sendJSON(streamId, obfuscationList, JSON.stringify(data));
                if (status != 0)
                    gs.warn('FSMWorkspaceUAUtil: Unable to send analytics for stream:' + streamId + '; status = ' + status);
                status = sn_uapaf.ScopedAnalyticsFramework.close(streamId);
            } else {
                gs.warn('FSMWorkspaceUAUtil: Unable to open Usage Analytics for stream ' + streamId);
            }
        } catch (e) {
            gs.error('FSMWorkspaceUAUtil: Error while logging analytics. ' + e.toString());
        }

    },
    type: 'FSMWorkspaceUAUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-09-29 20:45:18</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>a197ccf0fc529110f877d4e3020df188</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FSMWorkspaceUAUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Field Service Management" source="com.snc.work_management">b66bd6bb4722c210cd4e1ce4316d4387</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a197ccf0fc529110f877d4e3020df188</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-09-29 20:49:42</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
